name: Fruitapolis Transit Network
description:
Welcome to the city of Fruitapolis! Enjoy your visit!

To get around the city a whole tube network connects places in the city. Help the citizens of Fruitapolis get around by fixing the "Transit Network".

Instructions:
 - Drag available parts
 - Click parts to rotate them in place
 - Press the "play" button to open the tunnel to visitors
 - Press the "edit" button to change the tunnel afterwards if something goes wrong!

Enjoy!

Made in less than 1 day (16 hours) by a single person as part of the Global Game Jam 2020. (including all programming, art & levels)

 - Jeroen Penninck
